content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name:
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - codelist
    - name:
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: OTHER
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0021
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if the value of a variable, which is associated with an
  extensible codelist, is in the associated codelist or equal to 'OTHER'
Outcome:
  Message: Variable is not equal to value within the extensible codelist, nor equal
    to OTHER
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0021
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Conformance with the SDTMIG Domain Models is minimally
                  indicated by following SDTM-specified controlled terminology and
                  format guidelines for variables, when provided
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 3.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: When the CRF includes a list of values for a qualifier
                  field that includes "Other" and the "Other" is supplemented with
                  a "Specify" free text field
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item:
                Section: 4.2.7.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error if the value of a variable, which is associated with an extensible codelist, is in the associated codelist or equal to 'OTHER'

Outcome.Message: Variable is not equal to value within the extensible codelist, nor equal to OTHER

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Conformance with the SDTMIG Domain Models is minimally indicated by following SDTM-specified controlled terminology and format guidelines for variables, when provided
When the CRF includes a list of values for a qualifier field that includes "Other" and the "Other" is supplemented with a "Specify" free text field
